nodes.text: Bleb-Blek was a Jawa male who lived on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3643 BBY, he encountered a Padawan who seemed sick and was spouting gibberish about revenge before she ran into the desert and stole Jawa's map. Bleb-Blek tasked a Republic spacer to help him find the map and the Padawan.
